archimate:Driver.documentation:
Tietoevry Connect is acting as an elabler for Tietoevry Banking. Connect is providing hosting location for banking applications and therefore the delivery environment must bee the PCI-DSS + SWIFT compliancy. One of the key requirements on PCI-DSS is vulnerability management.
The problem is the same as with the "Customer 3rd party penetration test on Tietoevry Connect Norway delivery raised several issues which needs to be mitigated" - service relation and ownership for the asset is not clarified and therefore the problems cannot be fixed
Robert: "If Banking/Connect loose PCI/DSS certification then Banking will take a loss of some 1,5 bn nok revenue loss. But probably more over time. I can't find any penalties linked to this in the MSA yet, I guess it's just not to be contemplated."
